net.sf.appia.jgcs
Class AppiaDataSession

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jgcs.AbstractDataSession
      net.sf.appia.jgcs.AppiaDataSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sf.jgcs.DataSession
public class AppiaDataSession
extends net.sf.jgcs.AbstractDataSession

This class defines a AppiaDataSession and implements the DataSession of jGCS.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nuno Carvalho
